dig = {}
dig[0] = {'00000','01110','10001','10001','10001','10001','10001','01110'}
dig[1] = {'000','010','110','010','010','010','010','111'}
dig[2] = {'00000','01110','10001','00001','00010','00100','01000','11111'}
dig[3] = {'00000','01110','10001','10001','00110','00001','10001','01110'}
dig[4] = {'00000','00010','00110','01010','10010','11111','00010','00010'}
dig[5] = {'00000','11111','10000','11110','00001','00001','10001','01110'}
dig[6] = {'00000','01110','10000','11110','10001','10001','10001','01110'}
dig[7] = {'00000','11111','00001','00001','00010','00100','00100','00100'}
dig[8] = {'00000','01110','10001','10001','01110','10001','10001','01110'}
dig[9] = {'00000','01110','10001','10001','01111','00001','10001','01110'}

dig["+"]={'00000','00000','00100','00100','11111','00100','00100','00000'}
dig["-"]={'00000','00000','00000','00000','11111','00000','00000','00000'}
dig["R"]={'000000','000000','000100','000010','111111','000010','000100','000000'}
dig[":"]={'0','0','0','1','0','1','0','0'}
dig["H"]={'00011000','00100100','01000010','11000011','01011010','01011010','01000000','01111110'}


--Мыслю:
local d = {}
d[1]='01000100000000000000000000000000'
d[2]='01101101000010011000011101001100'

Small dig:
digl = {}
digl['1'] = {'000','000','010','110','010','010','010','111'}
digl['2'] = {'0000','0000','0110','1001','0001','0010','0100','1111'}
digl['3'] = {'0000','0000','0110','1001','0010','0001','1001','0110'}
digl['4'] = {'0000','0000','0001','0011','0101','1001','1111','0001'}
digl['5'] = {'0000','0000','1111','1000','1110','0001','1001','0110'}
digl['6'] = {'0000','0000','0110','1000','1110','1001','1001','0110'}
digl['7'] = {'0000','0000','1111','0001','0001','0010','0100','0100'}
digl['8'] = {'0000','0000','0110','1001','0110','1001','1001','0110'}
digl['9'] = {'0000','0000','0110','1001','1001','0111','0001','0110'}
digl['0'] = {'0000','0000','0110','1001','1001','1001','1001','0110'}
digl['R'] = {'0000','0000','0000','0010','1111','0010','0000','0000'}
digl[':'] = {'0000','0000','0000','0001','0000','0001','0000','0000'}
digl['H'] = {'00000','00100','001010','10001','10111','10111','10001','11111'}
